title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 441.8 - Medical Treatment Guidelines and Formulary
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 441.8 - Medical Treatment Guidelines and Formulary

State Regulations

In the event that a conflict exists between the Board's
medical treatment guidelines and the New York Formulary, the provisions of the
medical treatment guidelines shall prevail, unless the drug was prescribed in
accordance with Phase A or Phase B of the Formulary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
441.8

Adopted

New

York State Register June 5, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 22, eff. 6/5/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
